allow:
Bash(# 移动基础测试
mv t/echo_test.test tests/integration/basic/ && mv r/echo_test.result tests/results/basic/
mv t/simple_test.test tests/integration/basic/ && mv r/simple_test.result tests/results/basic/
mv t/test1.test tests/integration/basic/ && mv r/test1.result tests/results/basic/)

Bash(# 移动变量测试
mv t/variable_*.test tests/integration/variables/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv r/variable_*.result tests/results/variables/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv t/eval_test.test tests/integration/variables/ && mv r/eval_test.result tests/results/variables/)

Bash(# 移动控制流测试
mv t/if_*.test tests/integration/control_flow/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv r/if_*.result tests/results/control_flow/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv t/while_*.test tests/integration/control_flow/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv r/while_*.result tests/results/control_flow/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv t/control_flow_demo.test tests/integration/control_flow/ && mv r/control_flow_demo.result tests/results/control_flow/
mv t/nested_control_flow.test tests/integration/control_flow/ && mv r/nested_control_flow.result tests/results/control_flow/)

Bash(# 移动连接测试
mv t/connection_*.test tests/integration/connection/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv r/connection_*.result tests/results/connection/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv t/simple_connect.test tests/integration/connection/ && mv r/simple_connect.result tests/results/connection/
mv t/mysql_connect.test tests/integration/connection/ && mv r/mysql_connect.result tests/results/connection/)

Bash(# 移动错误处理测试
mv t/error_*.test tests/integration/error_handling/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv r/error_*.result tests/results/error_handling/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv t/expected_error_test.test tests/integration/error_handling/ && mv r/expected_error_test.result tests/results/error_handling/
mv t/fail_fast_*.test tests/integration/error_handling/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv r/fail_fast_*.result tests/results/error_handling/ 2>/dev/null || true)

Bash(# 移动并发测试
mv t/concurrent_*.test tests/integration/concurrent/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv r/concurrent_*.result tests/results/concurrent/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv t/db_isolation_*.test tests/integration/concurrent/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv r/db_isolation_*.result tests/results/concurrent/ 2>/dev/null || true)

Bash(# 移动source测试
mv t/source_*.test tests/integration/source/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv r/source_*.result tests/results/source/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv t/simple_inc_test.test tests/integration/source/ && mv r/simple_inc_test.result tests/results/source/)

Bash(# 移动高级测试
mv t/advanced_test.test tests/integration/advanced/ && mv r/advanced_test.result tests/results/advanced/
mv t/exec_test.test tests/integration/advanced/ && mv r/exec_test.result tests/results/advanced/
mv t/regex_test.test tests/integration/advanced/ && mv r/regex_test.result tests/results/advanced/
mv t/replace_regex_test.test tests/integration/advanced/ && mv r/replace_regex_test.result tests/results/advanced/
mv t/sorted_result_test.test tests/integration/advanced/ && mv r/sorted_result_test.result tests/results/advanced/)

Bash(# 移动性能测试
mv t/*_loop.test tests/integration/performance/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv r/*_loop.result tests/results/performance/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv t/parser_edge_cases.test tests/integration/performance/ && mv r/parser_edge_cases.result tests/results/performance/
mv t/sequence.test tests/integration/performance/ && mv r/sequence.result tests/results/performance/)
Bash(RUST_LOG=debug cargo run -- --extension dev --host 127.0.0.1 --port 3306 --user root --passwd 123456 t_for_test/basic/simple_test.test 2 >& 1)

Bash(CARGO_PROFILE_RELEASE_DEBUG=true cargo flamegraph --bin dingo_test_runner -- --parallel 2 t/examples/basic_example.test t/examples/connection_example.test --host 127.0.0.1 --port 3306 --user root --passwd 123456)
Bash(CARGO_PROFILE_RELEASE_DEBUG=true cargo flamegraph --bin dingo_test_runner -- --parallel 4 --host 127.0.0.1 --port 3306 --user root --passwd 123456 t/examples/ t/demo_tests/)
